location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Alfred Charles Lyall to Sir Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a cheque as payment for the items of crockery, furniture and stores he has chosen to purchase from Pelly (the cheque itself is not enclosed).Also included with the letter are two copies of his account with Pelly detailing the items he has decided to purchase and the overall cost of the account.
